content: I was trying to add debugging support to https://github.com/simrat39/rust-tools.nvim/ but was a bit confused on how ra's vscode extension handles debugging in the code lenses/hover actions. So the hover actions gives a cargo command, do i run it and somehow get the path to the debug binary? i tried looking at the vscode extension code but its a bit confusing
oops looks like i opened this in the wrong place
sim has marked this topic as resolved.
